thread.title: Security guard 'accidentally shoots self and wounds another' during Hollande speech...
thread.title_full: Security guard 'accidentally shoots self and wounds another' during Hollande speech...

title: Security guard 'accidentally shoots self and wounds another' during Hollande speech...
text: comments Two people have been shot after a during a speech by French President Francois Hollande. He was talking at the opening of the Paris to Bordeaux high-speed rail at Villognon when the gunshots interrupted him. It has been reported a security guard accidentally fired his gun, according to Le Figar o. It is understood he shot himself in the foot as well as wounding another man. Francois Hollande delivering a speech just three days before the gunshot incident Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
